TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Knaziy, title = Knaziy, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knaziy} }

S.FORM: = Knaziy = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang Knaziy. 84 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 264 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 253 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 11 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal88%, Bunun2%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq3%, Cou1%. Hangan alang Knai Tu-ku-bey-cu na alang Alang Knai (Alang Hongsyang) ka bsiyaq balay alang Tayal Squliq. Nniqan niya Nanto keyng Jinay go Hwasyang cwen alang Knai. Knlbangan Wa mniq mksipaw tunarac Yayung Peykang mi, Payku ddwiyaq beyhing hruwan hidaw hunac lmiqu. Nniqan lnglingay Llmiqu, haypa 1170 m. Quri ppanan rulu Mriq rulu: Tayhoku> Formosa Kwotaw 3 haw> Sweysaryeyn Kwotaw 6 haw> Tay14 seyng>Hari>Paran>Elu Rising seyng> Elu keyng cida elu Jweyyeyn> dhuq alang niyi da. Ppwaluk tyeyn-cu patas qtan alang Teyncu patas pkla nniqan alang. Klwanan sediq Tayal. Sduwi na kari saya Skari kari Tayal, ska kari Telu. Snlhayan snhiyan Kiristo kyo: Hongsyang Kiristo Cyoro Kyokay, Hongsyang Sin Yasu Kyokay. Pnyahan alang Knai pa dungus niya u "Qulung smturung krpuhan bay hidaw mrbu ka hmidaw lmiqu ssiyaw alang, wada pkdungus bay qtan ka pkbanah mbanah ka wasaw qhuni dara". Wada ka seyhu Nihong daw, miya qduriq Taiwan hini ka Kokominto seyhu, kiya ka wada pryuxun Hongsyang ka hangan alang da, Cbiyaw balay ka alang Knai pa knkingal mkpuruh ka alang wa mkrhak Yayung Peykang mi cida Yayung Tepirun, ya bay 300 mi 400 kngkawas ka prading muru elu rudan "Pyanan" mquri tudaya 8 alang pa to bay pnswayan snpeyyah Knai musa nganguc phiyu burah alang kana, so kiya daw knkingan alang hini pa ida tmhangan nanaq "Knai", dungus niya u "Pnneyyah Knai Niya". Quri pplahan mi sanan rmiwaw Qhdin Alang Qhdin. Qntan patas Jinay gokosyo wangcan:

= Knaziy = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang Knaziy. 84 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 264 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 253 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 11 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal88%, Bonon2%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq3%, Coo1%. Hangan alang Knai To-ko-bey-co na alang Alang Knai (Alang Hongsyang) ka bsiyaq balay alang Tayal Sqoliq. Nniqan niya Nanto keyng Jinay go Hwasyang cwen alang Knai. Knlbangan Wa mniq mksipaw tonarac Yayong Peykang mi, Payko ddwiyaq beyhing hrowan hidaw honac lmiqo. Nniqan lnglingay Llmiqo, haypa 1170 m. Qori ppanan rolo Mriq rolo: Tayhoko> Formosa Kwotaw 3 haw> Sweysaryeyn Kwotaw 6 haw> Tay14 seyng>Hari>Paran>Elo Rising seyng> Elo keyng cida elo Jweyyeyn> dhoq alang niyi da. Ppwalok tyeyn-co patas qtan alang Teynco patas pkla nniqan alang. Klwanan sediq Tayal. Sdowi na kari saya Skari kari Tayal, ska kari Telo. Snlhayan snhiyan Kiristo kyo: Hongsyang Kiristo Cyoro Kyokay, Hongsyang Sin Yaso Kyokay. Pnyahan alang Knai pa dongos niya o "Qolong smtorong krpohan bay hidaw mrbo ka hmidaw lmiqo ssiyaw alang, wada pkdongos bay qtan ka pkbanah mbanah ka wasaw qhoni dara". Wada ka seyho Nihong daw, miya qdoriq Taiwan hini ka Kokominto seyho, kiya ka wada pryoxon Hongsyang ka hangan alang da, Cbiyaw balay ka alang Knai pa knkingal mkporoh ka alang wa mkrhak Yayong Peykang mi cida Yayong Tepiron, ya bay 300 mi 400 kngkawas ka prading moro elo rodan "Pyanan" mqori todaya 8 alang pa to bay pnswayan snpeyyah Knai mosa ngangoc phiyo borah alang kana, so kiya daw knkingan alang hini pa ida tmhangan nanaq "Knai", dongos niya o "Pnneyyah Knai Niya". Qori pplahan mi sanan rmiwaw Qhdin Alang Qhdin. Qntan patas Jinay gokosyo wangcan:
